This looks great, and it was cool of you to share....but it's way too big for some computers (like mine).  If it could be significantly down-resed to under 1 GB, then many of us without great hard drives would be thankful.
This is HD! If you want crappy DVD quality, STOP BROWSING THE HD SECTION.
